delicacy.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something good to eat that is expensive or rare
delicacy.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Snails are considered a delicacy in France.
delicacy.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a careful and sensitive way of speaking or behaving so that you do not upset anyone
delicacy.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He carried out his duties with great delicacy and understanding.
delicacy.translation[0].definitions[2].d: the quality of being easy to harm or damage
